job.title: Software Developer
job.description: <strong><u>Position Summary<br><br></u></strong>The Programmer/Analyst will be responsible for web application development in VB.Net or C# and experience writing queries in a relational database. This position will assist a small team of developers in coding and modifying custom business applications and reports.<br><br><strong><u>Position Responsibilities May Include, But Not Limited To<br></u></strong><ul><li>Design, develop and implement business applications using current technologies.</li><li>Develop design documents such as technical specifications, functional requirements, object modules, system test plans, technical and user documentation.</li><li>Ensure successful completion of projects. </li><li>Provide support to maintain existing Intranet, Extranet and Internet sites and applications</li><li>Document process flows.</li><li>Participate in team code reviews.</li><li>Develop small to medium scale applications with low complexity.</li><li>Other projects or duties as assigned.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> Associate’s degree in Information Systems, Management Information System, Computer Science with at least 6 months of work experience or course work in software development.</li><li> Exposure to JavaScript and HTML</li><li> Exposure to development language such as .NET or Java</li><li> Exposure to database design</li><li> Exposure to multi-tier development, process flows, use cases, UML</li><li> Strong debugging skills</li><li> Understanding of Object Orientated Principles</li><li> Exposure to SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) principles</li><li> Ability to set and meet deadlines on projects</li><li> The ability to communicate effectively through written and verbal communication, including strong presentation skills and the ability to communicate technical ‘speak’ to a non-technical audience</li><li> Desire to pursue career in Application Development</li><li> Ability to self-teach new IT technologies</li><li> This position must pass a post-offer background and drug test.</li></ul>
